Lyric:
[00:11.980]She, she ain't real,

[00:26.230]Or don't you remember?
[00:28.320]Sure, she's got it all,
[00:31.950]But, baby, is that really what you want?
[00:38.510]Bless your soul, you've got you're head in the clouds,
[00:41.820]You made a fool out of you,
[00:43.760]And, boy, she's bringing you down,
[00:45.770]She made your heart melt,
[00:47.800]But you're cold to the core,
